entry.title: $2502 // Large One Bedroom with All New Kitchen and Bath!
entry.content:
Beautifully renovated one bedroom duplex!!
Awesome apartment with all new kitchen and bath..the apartment is two levels, main floor features an all new separate kitchen, bathroom and a small living space. the lower level features a HUGE bedroom space with an extra large walk in closet!

NO FEE apartment in a laundry building on quiet and charming East 88th Street in Yorkville, one block from the Carl Schurz Park and amazing jogging trails along the river!

*PRICE SHOWN IS THE NET EFFECTIVE RENT WITH 1 MONTH FREE ON AN 18 MONTH LEASE*

Owner managed and pet friendly! Contact us for a tour!

U.S. Guarantors Accepted.

516 E 88th St.
Apartment 1A
Phone: 646-758-0347
Web: www.aimconyc.com
$2501.83

Price and availability are subject to change.
Equal Housing Opportunity
Professionally Managed by OP Property Management, LLC
